thread.title: Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn Were Not Pleased With Meryl Streep's Speech Last Night
thread.title_full: Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn Were Not Pleased With Meryl Streep's Speech Last Night

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn Were Not Pleased With Meryl Streep's Speech Last Night
text:
Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn Were Not Pleased With Meryl Streep's Speech Last Night Share Share Tweet 
Sunday night at the Golden Globes, actress Meryl Streep gave an anti-Trump speech when she accepted the Cecil B. DeMille award. While most of Hollywood and the press were smitten by Streep, calling the speech " powerful " and "brave," at least two celebrities were not: Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn. 
A somewhat hilarious screenshot caught the two in various stages of "side-eye" during Streep's acceptance speech. Vaughn in particular looks as though he's about to explode, whereas Gibson just kind of looks annoyed. The Conservative table was not feeling Meryl's speech. #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/zdxDFhCZ1r
